name: The Rise of Chubtan
description: The Rise of the Chubtan is a chaotic and fast paced fighting game with constant looming death for all the players. Knock your enemies into pools of acid, spinning saw blades or even under a speeding train. You play a Mayan god fighting his brother for the souls of mankind.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: HD4000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: Yes please
